name: Paint by Bumpers
description:
2- 4 Players 

(Playstation Controllers Only)

Controls:

L1/R1 - Select Car / Honk

Square - Join / Confirm / Accelerate

Left Stick - Steer

Credits:

Barry Evans - Programming - "Midnight Strider"

Charlie Ritter - Composer/SFX - "Critter Mobile"

Nicole Frisella - Artist - "Car-Avaggio"

Jacob Freeland - Programming - "Skyblue Stallion"

Kain Shepard - Technical Artist - "VaporWagon"

Byron Beasley - Sound Design - "Best Byron Buggy"

06/05/19 - Game Jam
